word:
(721)                       M. 70 '09. April 12, '09. 
                                 Loma Linda, Calif. 

Eliza Morton 


     We are about to leave Loma Linda for our journey to College View, Nebraska. I have spoken once while here. Last Sabbath the patients and church members assembled on the beautiful grounds of the sanitarium, and I spoke to them from the 58th chapter of Isaiah.
